name: Grupa Etendard
description: We are a company with over 6 years experience in web application and mobile programming. We operate in such technologies as PHP, ASP, JAVA, C#, AJAX/JS/jQuery, ActionScript, Zend/Kohoana/Symfony, MySQL/PostgreSQL/MsSQL, CSS3, HTML5, Android, iOS and more. Our projects include such types as: Business process analysis, E-learning platforms, B2B/B2C websites/systems, Communities and network portals, Work management systems, Marketing, Education adn many more.
